title: How to Make Mexican S'mores

steps.headline: Spread peanut butter on each of the tortillas.
Sprinkle the marshmallows and chocolate chips on the tortillas.
Roll the tortillas up like a burrito or cigar.
Wrap each tortilla in foil.
steps.description: Secure the ends by twisting them.

steps.headline: Place the rolled tortillas on the grill.
steps.description: Grill for about 5 minutes. Turn them once about halfway through.

text: Spread peanut butter on each of the tortillas.  Sprinkle the marshmallows and chocolate chips on the tortillas.  Roll the tortillas up like a burrito or cigar.  Wrap each tortilla in foil. Secure the ends by twisting them. Place the rolled tortillas on the grill. Grill for about 5 minutes. Turn them once about halfway through. Serve and enjoy.  Finished.
